signals.problem_statement: The customer lacks a ticketing system to track the status of tasks, leading to dropped balls and poor service.
signals.customer_ask: We need to offer better service and a better experience to our customers.
signals.suggested_solution: Implement a ticketing system to track task progress.
signals.context: Sales team with 20-21 direct reports, B2B interactions.

signals.problem_statement: There is excessive manual sorting of emails, which is inefficient for the sales team.
signals.customer_ask: Automation features to reduce manual sorting.
signals.suggested_solution: Enhance automation capabilities to streamline email sorting.
signals.context: Sales team with 20-21 direct reports, B2B interactions.

signals.problem_statement: The current system does not provide adequate analytics to track team performance and workload.
signals.customer_ask: Access to detailed analytics to monitor team performance.
signals.suggested_solution: Provide robust analytics features to track workload and performance metrics.
signals.context: Sales team with 20-21 direct reports, B2B interactions.

signals.problem_statement: The customer struggles with managing follow-ups and ensuring timely communication with clients.
signals.customer_ask: A way to track follow-ups and ensure timely updates to customers.
signals.suggested_solution: Implement features to automate follow-up reminders and status updates.
signals.context: Sales team with 20-21 direct reports, B2B interactions.
